title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: When using a dynamic text element to display the contents of a database field with three types of content (HTML text within <html>...</html> tag, HTML fragments not within <html> tag, and text with RTF tags), the dynamic text content type appears to have no effect.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Prepare a database field containing the mentioned types of content.
2. Create a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
3. Verify if the dynamic text content type is correctly applied to each type of content in the field.
